trans-unit.source: Represents a class that can read and write key identifiers, key identifier clauses, and security tokens.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个类，可以读取和写入密钥标识符、 密钥标识符子句和安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: Use the SecurityTokenSerializer class to read and write <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken> classes as XML.
trans-unit.target: SecurityTokenSerializer 类用于读取和写入<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier>， <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause>，和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken>类作为 XML。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier>

trans-unit.source: The SecurityTokenSerializer class has methods to determine whether this class can read and write these entities and to actually read and write them.
trans-unit.target: SecurityTokenSerializer 类具有确定此类是否可以读取和写入这些实体并将实际读取和写入它们的方法。

trans-unit.source: For security tokens, these methods are <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadToken%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteToken%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadToken%2A>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.WriteToken%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 对于安全令牌，这些方法为<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadToken%2A>， <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteToken%2A>， <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadToken%2A>，和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.WriteToken%2A>。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.WriteToken%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadToken%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteToken%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> class.
Determines whether this serializer can read the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""></xref> element referred to by the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: 确定此序列化程序是否可以读取<xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""></xref>元素引用由指定的 XML 读取器。

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 派生自的类<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer>类必须重写<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The CanReadKeyIdentifier method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%2A> method.
An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to read the key identifier.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""></xref> XML element can be read; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>当指定<xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""> </xref> XML 元素可以是读取; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

Determines whether this serializer can read a clause in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""></xref> element referred to by the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: 确定此序列化程序是否可以读取中的子句<xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""></xref>元素引用由指定的 XML 读取器。

trans-unit.target: 派生自的类<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer>类必须重写<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierClauseCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierClauseCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>当可以读取指定的密钥标识符子句;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
